description: Identify and catalog all reference sheets and context files across coderef projects

orchestrator.role: Aggregate all project indexes into master context-index
orchestrator.notes: Aggregated 173 total files from 3 projects into master index with statistics and usage recommendations

agents.role: Search coderef-system for reference sheets and context files
agents.notes: Found 45 context files: guides, templates, standards, documentation

agents.role: Search coderef-dashboard for reference sheets and context files
agents.notes: Found 109 context files: 23 docs, 3 schemas, 1 template, 30 reference sheets, 6 guides, 4 standards, 42 other

agents.role: Search coderef-core package for reference sheets and context files
agents.notes: Found 19 context files: 8 docs, 8 reference sheets, 1 guide, 3 other

references.title: CodeRef Core - Comprehensive Codebase Audit Report
references.description: Complete audit of all CodeRef implementations across 3 locations (root, src/, coderef-core-updates/). Identifies source of truth, feature mapping, critical issues, and migration recommendations.

references.title: Complete CodeRef System Consolidation Plan
references.description: Migration strategy to consolidate all three CodeRef implementations into one unified system with working regex and AST scanners producing ElementData[] output.

references.title: Timestamp Utility (Python)
references.description: Python script for generating standardized timestamps in YAML front matter format (YYYY-MM-DD) for CodeRef document generation. Will be used when creating any document in the coderef ecosystem. Planned location: coderef/notes/timestamp.py or scripts/utils/timestamp.py.

references.title: RSMS Resource Sheet Generator
references.description: Resource Sheet Metadata Standards (RSMS) generator for creating compliant YAML front matter in resource sheets. Follows RSMS v2.0 schema. Planned implementation - similar to uds.py pattern. Will generate RSMS v2.0 compliant YAML front matter with required fields: agent, date, task, subject, parent_project, category.

references.title: Reference Sheet Generator (Python MCP)
references.description: Python MCP resource sheet generator with TypeScript-style 24-category classification, confidence scoring, and fuzzy matching. Enhancement planned to align Python implementation with TypeScript reference blueprint.

references.title: CodeRef Core - Resource Directory
references.description: Central resource directory containing 10 reference sheets and technical documentation for coderef-core scanner implementation. Includes API contracts, architecture diagrams, scanner system docs, and implementation plans. Key files: SCANNER-SYSTEM.md, API-SCANNER-CONTRACT.md, TYPESCRIPT-IMPLEMENTATION-PLAN.md, SCAN-EXECUTOR.md.
